Title: Customer Satisfaction Survey
Description: A survey to understand customer satisfaction levels.

Questions.Text: How satisfied are you with our service?
Would you recommend us to others?

Title: Employee Feedback Survey
Description: Gathering feedback from employees on workplace satisfaction.

Questions.Text: How do you rate your work-life balance?
Do you feel valued at work?

Title: Product Feedback Survey
Description: Understanding customer feedback about our latest product.

Questions.Text: How do you rate the quality of the product?
How likely are you to purchase this product again?
